item.description:
at Lorem Ipsum Books, Inman Square.

J. Morrison's NEW WHISPERS series will feature new digital prints, editions, bags, and ephemera. This is the first time this series will be exhibited publicly since its recent completion at the Anderson Ranch residency in Snowmass Village, CO.

The artist will not only be present for the opening, but he will also be creating, LIVE, a new screenprinting edition to commemorate Lorem Ipsum Books' 7th anniversary!

J. Morrison is a Brooklyn based artist/designer/performer who has exhibited in notable venues that include MoMA PS1, the MACRO Museum of Contemporary Art in Rome, KW Institute for Contemporary Art in Berlin, the five New York Art Book Fairs, Printed Matter, P.P.O.W, Forever & Today, Exit Art, White Box, ISE Cultural Foundation, MOCA Cleveland, Boston University, and the Art Institute of Boston.

http://www.facebook.c...

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Art Opening, Reception, PLUS - LIVE Screenprinting with artist J. Morrison
